context_evidences: - At the White House, Biden joined fellow Group of Seven leaders in calling for revoking Russia's "most favored nation" trade status, which would allow G7 nations to increase tariffs and set quotas on Russian products. The U.S. Congress would need to pass legislation to revoke the trade status, and lawmakers recently have been moving in that direction. Reference: https://www.reuters.com/world/us-lift-russias-most-favored-nation-status-pelosi-2022-03-11/ published on 2022-03-11 14:24:07

- President Joe Biden on Friday took new steps along with U.S. allies to punish Russia economically over its invasion of Ukraine, targeting trade and shutting down development funds while also announcing a ban on imports of Russian seafood, vodka and diamonds. Reference: https://www.reuters.com/world/us-lift-russias-most-favored-nation-status-pelosi-2022-03-11/ published on 2022-03-11 14:24:07

correction_response: This tweet is misleading. Biden did express concerns about escalating the conflict to World War Three if the US were to send offensive equipment with American crews to Ukraine (https://www.reuters.com/world/us-lift-russias-most-favored-nation-status-pelosi-2022-03-11/). However, the recent decision to send tanks does not involve American crews, which is a crucial distinction (https://www.reuters.com/world/us-may-drop-opposition-sending-abrams-tanks-ukraine-officials-2023-01-24/). The tanks are intended to assist Ukraine in defending itself, not to involve the US directly in the conflict.
note_1_text: The full quote is: "the idea that we’re going to send in offensive equipment and have planes and tanks and trains going in with American pilots and American crews… That's called World War III"    https://www.whitehouse.gov/briefing-room/speeches-remarks/2022/03/11/remarks-by-president-biden-at-the-house-democratic-caucus-issues-conference/    The US agreed to send tanks (equipment) to Ukraine, not troops.    https://apnews.com/article/russia-ukraine-military-technology-germany-7b63726a3935da3f03424e98e52a85b2
note_2_text: Just to clarify, Biden said the above but with the added qualifier of "with American crews and pilots"    Don't know if that's substantially different but it is context that should not have been omitted.     https://youtu.be/gdEto5MGADs
queries:
1. "Joe Biden statement on sending tanks to Ukraine leading to World War Three"
2. "Joe Biden's recent actions on sending tanks to Ukraine"

tweet_text: Does anyone remember when Joe Biden said that sending tanks to Ukraine would be tantamount to World War Three? That was less than a year ago. Now he’s sending tanks to Ukraine.
